language.item: Please complete the statements for the hyperlink
The headline should be at least 3 characters long
With this module you can adminster the news.
Please select, whether you want to enable or disable the "read more..."-function
Please select, whether you want to allow comments under news
Please select the category, where do you want to find the news
Please select, whether you want to display the category name of a news in the breadcrumb
The newstext should be at least 3 characters long
Please type in, how many characters a news should have, to enable the "read more..."-function
